description:
Ray is a senior in college.

"I'm so ready to be done," he said. "It's been a long haul."

"You aren't going to miss anything about it?"

"Yeah," he said. "The parties and the social life. But I can find that wherever."

Ray was kind of ambiguous about his sexuality, but he did say he wasn't seeing anyone currently.

I love how furry Ray is — nice hairy chest and stomach even if it is clippered!
title: Ray
